Description.Text: Sun beach Lindos hotel is placed harmonically on a fine sandy beach of Lardos and offers spectacular Mediterranean sea views. A family-oriented hotel with a total of 92 rooms, Sun beach Lindos seaside hotel is an ideal destination for families and couples. Earth colors prevail in both the reception area and rooms, which are decorated in a traditional style, with functionality as an absolute priority. Endless time of relaxation at the heart of Lardos Beach in the most refined of atmospheres .Whatever the occasion may be to visit this all inclusive hotel: romantic getaways, family holiday or honeymoon, the staff will make sure to offer genuine Greek hospitality and a truly memorable stay.
